summary: Small Player home in the far eastern mountains between Riften and Windhelm
descriptionHtml:
Farwatch player home

Once a imperial guard post on a little used pass to Morrowind, 
Farwatch was rendered unnecessary when a cave-in blocked the tunnel.
For years it served as an out of the way place for the legion to store its
less... sociable members.  But now with the civil war in Skyrim the Legion needs all 
its members to battle the Stormcloaks.  Farwatch was abandoned, it was too well known for a 
base to fight the stormcloaks.  Now it sits vacant, waiting for a tenant.

Player home located N-N/E of riften, along the edge of the map
Featuring:
-Beautiful view of the rift valley
-outside stable

-Library
-Kitchen
-Two enlisted rooms
-Commanders office/room with full storage closet
-miscellaneous storage

A basement with:
-Full crafting, anvil, armor bench, grindstone, alchemy and enchanting stations
-ten shield holders
-thirty-one weapon racks
-six manikins
-two double weapon/shield holders
-six dagger cases
-two book shelves
-fourteen storage boxes
-one secret area

---
Now with revised lighting, and an extra basement room.
And now with teleport stones to
Breezehome -needs key
Honeyside -needs key
Vilendril hall -needs key
Hjerim
proudspire manor
winterhold
dawnstar
Sleeping Giant inn (riverwood)
Vilemyr inn (iverstead)
falkreath yarl hall
morthal yarl hall


I have tweaked the navmeshes as best as I can, hopefuly it should help.

Endorse if you like, comment if you want.
author: Mr Cheaterson
